description: This bright 2,357 sq. ft. 4 bed 3.5 bath townhome at Polygon's Ridgewood boasts an open layout with overheight ceilings, laminate wood flooring, and a spacious deck. The gourmet kitchen features custom cabinetry with extra wall pantry storage, sleek appliances, engineered stone countertops, and a central island. The main ensuite features a luxurious soaker tub as well as a spa shower with bench. Plus, enjoy a separate laundry room with built-in shelving upstairs, main floor powder room, the convenience of a family room downstairs, a double car garage off the main entrance, and a heat pump air conditioning system. Visit our sales office and display homes at 3637 Sheffield Avenue, Coquitlam, open noon - 5pm daily (except Friday), to learn more.
